      • deleteTenant

        public void deleteTenant​(TenantId tenantId)
        We intentionally leave this method without "Transactional" annotation due to complexity of the method. Ideally we should delete related entites without "paginatedRemover" logic. But in such a case we can't clear cache and send events. We will create separate task to make "deleteTenant" transactional.
        Specified by:
        deleteTenant in interface TenantService
